name: Red Light Dialogs
description:
This is a very simple game that I made during the weekend on my very few hours available. 

The idea, based on the game theme  Contrast, is to deliver  a reflexive experience where the player talks to a local person on a trip, trying to understand a bit more of what that person is and what moves that person forward. 

Due the lack of time, only part of the game was made :(
